subject: CNN.com Daily Top 10
body:
CNN.com Daily Top 10


































Judge tosses KFC trans fat lawsuit
A federal judge dismissed a lawsuit brought by a doctor who accused KFC of not telling customers it used trans fats to fry its chicken.

7. Nude mistress image priced at $4M





8. House fails to override veto





9. Antidepressant warning broadened





10. KKK witness speaks from grave




 
















Sex tape arrest
A South Carolina woman is arrested for allegedly producing pornography.  Affiliate WCSC reports. (May 2)
